mapper.select: SELECT b.bname , b.mno bizMno , b.bno , b.phone , b.address , COUNT(c.content) AS content , c.rdate , AVG(c.grade) AS grade FROM business b JOIN comments c ON b.bno = c.bno WHERE b.address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{address},'%') AND b.typeNum = #{mtype} GROUP BY b.bno;
SELECT no , name , week , time FROM laundrytime WHERE time NOT LIKE'%00:00~00:00%' AND no = #{bno};
SELECT mno , bno , lno , name , product , price FROM laundryinfo WHERE bno = #{bno} AND price != 0;
SELECT e.eno AS eno , cnt , price , e.ename AS ename FROM bsn_equipment be JOIN equipment e on e.eno = be.eno WHERE bno = #{bno} AND price != 0;
SELECT etc.etcno AS etcno , price , e2.etcname AS etcname FROM bsn_etc etc JOIN etc e2 on etc.etcno = e2.etcno WHERE bno = #{bno} AND price != 0;
SELECT content , mname , DATE(rdate) AS rdate , grade FROM infor_review WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY rdate DESC;
SELECT content , mname , DATE(rdate) AS rdate , grade FROM infor_review WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY grade DESC;
